config.script:
import traceback
	try:
		system.perspective.sendMessage("ResetSearch", payload={}, scope="session")
		system.perspective.sendMessage("ResetRegistration", payload={}, scope="session")
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Events RegisterEventSearch Button Clear")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

props.text: Event Name is a required field to create new event.

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	#system.perspective.print(message)
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False
